entry.title: Data-Driven Stochastic Closure Modeling via Conditional Diffusion Model and Neural Operator

link.title: Data-Driven Stochastic Closure Modeling via Conditional Diffusion Model and Neural Operator

entry.content:
A descriptive caption for the image or additional context.

Here I am incluing some animations related to my Data-Driven Stochastic Closure Modeling via Conditional Diffusion Model and Neural Operator project.

Animations of the true vorticity field, and the simulation vorticity with and without G from 30s to 50s.
entry.summary: X. Dong, C. Chen, J.-L. Wuï¼ŒarXiv preprint arXiv:2408.02965
